common.breakfast: bread, butter, jam, milk, tea, coffee, sprouts/chana, seasonal fruits
common.lunch: Pickle, papad, mix salad, Onion, White rice, Lemon, Ghee

monday.breakfast: Aloo paratha, Ketchup, Curd, Non-Veg: Boiled Egg; Veg: Pineapple, Mint & Corriander Chutney
monday.lunch: Puri, Chana masala, Toor dal fry, Mix veg curry, Seasonal fruit (watermelon), Kerala rice, curd & sugar
monday.dinner: Veg: Mutter Paneer Masala, Non-Veg: Egg Gravy, White Rice, Chana dal tadka, Chapati, Makkan Peda

tuesday.breakfast: Pongal, vada, Ground nut Chutney, Non-Veg: Omelette; Veg: Orange
tuesday.lunch: Payasam dry, sambar, Aloo Gobhi curry, Fresh Fruit Juice, Kerala rice, Chapathi
tuesday.snacks: Fresh fruit salad, Lemon juice (No milk, coffee and tea)
tuesday.dinner: Arhar Dal tadka, Aloo 65, Kadhi Pakoda, White rice, Chapati, kheer

wednesday.breakfast: Masala Dosa, Tomato Chutney, Sambar, Non-Veg: Boiled Egg; Veg: Banana, peanut butter
wednesday.lunch: Baigan masala, Sambar, cabbage tomato curry, chapathi, Kerala rice, spiced buttermilk
wednesday.dinner: Veg: Hyderabad Paneer Dish, Non-Veg: Hyderabad Style Chicken masala, white rice, Moong dal, Lachcha Paratha, Laddu, Lemon

thursday.breakfast: Puri, Semi-dry black Chana masala, Non-Veg: Omelette; Veg: Pineapple
thursday.lunch: Soya Masala, Rasam, Tomato rice, Onion Raita, Palak Chapati
thursday.dinner: Bisi bele bath, Yam with chana dry, chapathi, aloo matar curry, Rasam, White rice, icecream

friday.breakfast: Idly, Vada, sambar, coconut chutney, Non-veg: Boiled egg; Veg: Banana
friday.lunch: Rajma masala, Bottle Gourd Sambar, Kerala rice, Phulka, Minty Buttermilk
friday.dinner: Non Veg: Chicken Gravy; Veg: Paneer Butter masala, pulao, Mix dal, Chapathi, Kesari(Rawa), mango pickle, Lemon

saturday.breakfast: Gobi Mix Veg Paratha, Green Coriander chutney, Peanut Butter, Non Veg: Boiled Egg; Veg: Musk Melon
saturday.lunch: Drum Stick-Tomato gravy, Dal Makhni, Fried aloo, Phulka, Rasam, curd & sugar
saturday.dinner: Dal makhani, Aviyal; mushroom masala, Tomato rice, Phulka, custard

sunday.breakfast: Onion Rava dosa, Tomato chutney, Sambhar, Non-Veg: Boiled egg; Veg: Guava
sunday.lunch: Non-Veg: Chicken Butter Masala; Veg: Paneer - Semi Dry; Chana, Chapati, Veg Biryani, Raita, Fresh Fruit Juice
sunday.dinner: Aloo Masala, Poori, Green vegetables with beans, Arhar Daltadka, White Rice, gulab jamun
